name: RegexReplace
releaseNotes:
What's new in version 3.*
Multiple input search paths
Empty replace value
Minimatch support for search paths
UTF-8 Support
-Raw when loading files
Click [here](https://github.com/knom/vsts-regex-tasks/) for more Information.
author: knom

inputs.name: InputSearchPattern
inputs.label: Search Paths to Input Files
inputs.helpMarkDown: Supports multiple lines of minimatch patterns. [More Information](https://aka.ms/minimatchexamples)

inputs.name: FindRegex
inputs.label: Find RegEx
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Regular Expression to find - use capture groups for replace. [More Information](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/standard/base-types/regular-expression-language-quick-reference#grouping_constructs)

inputs.name: ReplaceRegex
inputs.label: Replace With
inputs.helpMarkDown: The expression to replace with (use $1, $2, .. for the capture groups from find).

inputs.name: UseUTF8
inputs.label: Use UTF-8 Encoding
inputs.helpMarkDown: Reads and writes the files using UTF-8 Encoding; otherwise ASCII encoding is used.

inputs.name: UseRAW
inputs.label: Use -Raw when reading file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Reads the files using -Raw option. Requires Powershell version v3 or higher
